idle.command: noti -t "Claude Code" -m "Session is now idle in $CCMANAGER_WORKTREE_BRANCH"

busy.command: noti -t "Claude Code" -m "Session is now busy on branch $CCMANAGER_WORKTREE_BRANCH"

waiting_input.command: noti -t "Claude Code" -m "Claude is waiting for your input in $CCMANAGER_WORKTREE_BRANCH branch"
